Package model

package model
  • Class
    Description
    Board
    Represents the game board and manages the game.
    District
    Represents a district in the game.
    DistrictColor
    Represents the color of a district
    Grid
    Represents the grid of the game board, containing hexagons in different positions.
    Hexagon
    Represents a tile on the game grid.
    LeaderBoard
    Represents the leaderboard of the game.
    Model
    This class is the template that all models must follow
    Place
    Represents a place in the game.
    Player
    Represents a player in the Akropolis game.
    Quarries
    Represents a quarries in the game.
    Site
    Represents a site in the game A site is a collection of tiles where the player can pick tiles from
    StackTiles
    Represents a stack of tiles in the game.
    Tile
    This class represents a tile that the player can set onto the board.
